Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local function waitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do wait() end return parent[child] end
local Tool = script.Parent local Glove = Tool.Handle
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService('Debris')
local Character local Player local Torso local Humanoid
local PlayerGui
Tool.Enabled = true
local Mouse = nil
local Charge = 0 local Enabled = true
local Glove_Gui = nil local Glove_Frame = nil local Glove_FillFrame = nil
local Fry_Sound = waitForChild(Glove, 'FrySound') local Fry2_Sound = waitForChild(Glove, 'FrySound_2')
local ForceCharge_Anim local ForceRelease_Anim
local Gui = {} -- Class, that contains functions to create various gui objects
-- Generic object Create function, which I am using to create Gui's -- Thanks to Stravant! function Gui:Create(guiType) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(guiType) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
function Gui:Clone(obj) return function(data) local cloneObj = obj:Clone() for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == "number" then v.Parent = cloneObj else cloneObj[k] = v end end return cloneObj end end
local Lightning_Part = Instance.new('Part') Lightning_Part.Name = 'Lightning' Lightning_Part.FormFactor = 3 Lightning_Part.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Lightning_Part.Anchored = false Lightning_Part.CanCollide = false
local Lightning_Mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') Lightning_Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.15, 0.15, 0.15) Lightning_Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65419828" Lightning_Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65419395" Lightning_Mesh.Parent = Lightning_Part
local Sphere = Instance.new('Part') Sphere.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) Sphere.Transparency = 0.8 Sphere.Shape = 'Ball' Sphere.FormFactor = 3 Sphere.Name = 'Energy'
local Sphere_Mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') Sphere_Mesh.MeshType = 'FileMesh' Sphere_Mesh.Name = 'Mesh' Sphere_Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48423624" Sphere_Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48598142" Sphere_Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.01, 0.01, 0.01) Sphere_Mesh.Parent = Sphere
local Lightning_List = {}
local MaxLightning = 16
local EnergySphere = Instance.new('Part') local BlastSphere = Instance.new('Part')
local function Blow(hit, laser) if (#Lightning_List > 4 or laser) and hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hit.Parent:IsA('Hat') and hit.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') end if humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(7.5 * #Lightning_List/4) humanoid.Sit = true
if laser then humanoid:TakeDamage(22.5) end
local torso = waitForChild(humanoid.Parent, 'Torso')
BlastSphere = Sphere:Clone() local bMesh = waitForChild(BlastSphere, 'Mesh') bMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.25, 0.25)
BlastSphere.CFrame = hit.CFrame BlastSphere.Parent = game.Workspace
RBX_Debris:AddItem(BlastSphere, 0.5)
local bVelocity = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bVelocity.P = 200000 bVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(bVelocity.P, bVelocity.P, bVelocity.P) * 10 bVelocity.velocity = (torso.Position - Torso.Position).unit * 45.0 bVelocity.Parent = torso
RBX_Debris:AddItem(bVelocity, 0.75) end end end
local function FireBeam(beamStart, beamEnd) local distance = (beamStart - beamEnd).magnitude if distance > 150 then distance = 150 end local laser = Instance.new('Part') laser.Name = 'Bullet' laser.Anchored = true laser.CanCollide = false laser.Shape = 'Block' laser.formFactor = 'Custom' laser.Size = Vector3.new(2.0, 2.0, distance + 0.2) laser.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic laser.Locked = true laser.TopSurface = 0 laser.BottomSurface = 0 laser.BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Bright red') laser.CFrame = CFrame.new(beamEnd, beamStart) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -distance/2) laser.Parent = game.Workspace laser.Touched:connect(function(hit) Blow(hit, laser) end) RBX_Debris:AddItem(laser, 0.35) end
local function GenerateForce() if Charge < 20 then Charge = 0 Glove_FillFrame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) for i = 1, #Lightning_List do Lightning_List[i]:Destroy() end Lightning_List = {} if EnergySphere then EnergySphere:Destroy() end return end
-- do effect here pl0x
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 9.0
wait(0.75)
ForceRelease_Anim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ForceReleaseAnim) if ForceRelease_Anim then ForceRelease_Anim:Play() end
FireBeam(Glove.Position, Glove.Position + Glove.CFrame.lookVector * 30.0)
if Fry_Sound then Fry_Sound:Stop() end if Fry2_Sound then Fry2_Sound:Stop() end
-- BEAM CANNON
local bVelocity = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bVelocity.P = 200000 bVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(bVelocity.P, bVelocity.P, bVelocity.P) * 10 bVelocity.velocity = Torso.CFrame.lookVector * - 60 bVelocity.Parent = Torso
RBX_Debris:AddItem(bVelocity, #Lightning_List/(MaxLightning * 2)) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0
Charge = 0 Glove_FillFrame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) for i = 1, #Lightning_List do Lightning_List[i]:Destroy() end Lightning_List = {} if EnergySphere then EnergySphere:Destroy() end
wait(0.35) if ForceRelease_Anim then ForceRelease_Anim:Stop() end end
local function CreateLightning() if #Lightning_List < MaxLightning then local lightning = Lightning_Part:Clone() lightning.Parent = Glove
local lWeld = Instance.new('Weld') lWeld.Part0 = Glove lWeld.Part1 = lightning lWeld.Parent = lightning tick() lWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(math.random(-1000, 1000)/1000, math.random(-1000, 1000)/1000, math.random(-1000, 1000)/1000) * CFrame.Angles(math.random(), math.random(), math.random())
table.insert(Lightning_List, lightning) Spawn(function() wait(0.25) lightning.Transparency = 1.0 end)
if #Lightning_List == MaxLightning then Spawn(function() local sign = -1 while #Lightning_List == MaxLightning do for i = 1, #Lightning_List do if Lightning_List[i] then if sign == 1 then Lightning_List[i].Transparency = 0.0 else Lightning_List[i].Transparency = 1.0 end end sign = sign * -1 wait() end wait() sign = sign * -1 end end) end end end
local function OnEquip(mouse) Mouse = mouse
Character = Tool.Parent Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Torso = waitForChild(Character, 'Torso') Humanoid = waitForChild(Character, 'Humanoid')
PlayerGui = waitForChild(Player, 'PlayerGui')
if PlayerGui:FindFirstChild('GloveGui') == nil then Glove_Gui = Gui:Create'ScreenGui'{ Name = 'GloveGui', Parent = PlayerGui }
Glove_Frame = Gui:Create'Frame'{ Name = 'GloveFrame', Parent = Glove_Gui, Size = UDim2.new(0, 250, 0, 25), Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -125, 1, -110), BackgroundTransparency = 1.0, Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxSquare }
Glove_FillFrame = Gui:Clone(Glove_Frame){ Name = 'FillFrame', Parent = Glove_Frame, BackgroundTransparency = 0.0, Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0), Position = UDim2.new(0, -8, 0, -8), BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0), Style = Enum.FrameStyle.Custom, ZIndex = 5.0 } else Glove_Gui = PlayerGui.GloveGui Glove_Frame = waitForChild(Glove_Gui, 'GloveFrame') Glove_FillFrame = waitForChild(Glove_Frame, 'FillFrame') end
Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() Enabled = true if Fry_Sound then Fry_Sound:Play() end wait() if Fry2_Sound then Fry2_Sound:Play() end ForceCharge_Anim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ForceChargeAnim) if ForceCharge_Anim then ForceCharge_Anim:Play() end while Enabled do Charge = math.min(Charge + 1, 97) Glove_FillFrame.Size = UDim2.new(Charge/97, 16, 0, 25) if Charge%6 == 0 then CreateLightning() end
if not EnergySphere.Parent then EnergySphere = Sphere:Clone() EnergySphere.Parent = Glove
local eWeld = Instance.new('Weld') eWeld.Part0 = Glove eWeld.Part1 = EnergySphere eWeld.Parent = EnergySphere
eWeld.C1 = CFrame.new() else local mesh = waitForChild(EnergySphere, 'Mesh') local size = math.min(mesh.Scale.X + 0.002, 0.1) mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) * size end wait() end if ForceCharge_Anim then ForceCharge_Anim:Stop() end end)
Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() Enabled = false GenerateForce() end) end
local function OnUnequip() if Glove_Gui then Glove_Gui:Destroy() end if Fry_Sound then Fry_Sound:Stop() end if Fry2_Sound then Fry2_Sound:Stop() end
if ForceCharge_Anim then ForceCharge_Anim:Stop() end if ForceRelease_Anim then ForceRelease_Anim:Stop() end
for i = 1, #Lightning_List do if Lightning_List[i] then Lightning_List[i]:Destroy() end end Lightning_List = {} Charge = 0 Glove_FillFrame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) if EnergySphere then EnergySphere:Destroy() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquip) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequip)
Glove.Touched:connect(function(hit) Blow(hit, nil) end)
